name: giving tuesday hat
yarn_weight: any gauge - designed for any gauge
notes:
a quick & easy 2 x 2 ribbed hat pattern thatâ€™s perfect to knit while chatting with family & friends or relaxing with holiday movies!

options for dk or worsted weight yarn plus beanie or folded brim versions. add stripes for fun!

nautilus 1954 is a washington-based (& growing) community of knitters and crocheters that have taken the mission to express gratitude and love to our united states navy submarine fleet through handknit & crocheted superwash wool hats.

find us on facebook (nautilus1954) & instagram (@nautilus_1954), email woolhats@nautilus1954.com for more information and join our ravelry group [nautilus 1954](/groups/nautilus-1954).
